headline: Marsh McLennan’s Mercer to Acquire SECOR Asset Management
summary: NEW YORK, February 18, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today announced that it reached an agreement to acquire SECOR Asset Management, a global provider of bespoke strategic and portfolio solutions. Terms of the transaction, which is expected to close in the second quarter of 2025, subject to regulatory approvals

Terms of the transaction, which is expected to close in the second quarter of 2025, subject to regulatory approvals
